text: wlma fatahuu aweythm wajaduu thaman bidaeatahum aldhy dfewh qad rudd 'iilayhim qalu: ya 'abana madha natlub 'akthar min hdha? hdha thaman bidaeatuna rddah aleaziz 'ilyna, fkn mtmynana ealaa akhyna, warslh mena; lnjlb teamana wfyrana lahlna, wanahfaz akhana, wanazdad himl baeir lh; fa'iina aleaziz ykyl likuli wahid himl beyr, wdhlk kayl yasir elyh
